original_text: The same came for a witness, to bear witness of the Light, that all men through him might believe.
korean_text: 그가 증언하러 왔으니 곧 빛에 대하여 증언하고 모든 사람이 자기로 말미암아 믿게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: The same came for a witness
to bear witness of the Light
that all men through him might believe
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 그로 말미암아 믿게 하려 함이라
